WRITING.TEXT: Same here. I can relate to that. I used to listen to music and would just be able to escape for a while. I tried the other day and I really struggled with listening to music. I would turn off the music a few minutes after. Pm me if you feel like you ever want to talk to someone.
Am experiencing the same with ear ringing. It's irritating. :(
I won't do it. I've been wondering about it but now I feel a bit better with others saying no and there are options. Thank you guys.
